title: Microsoft just launched a Notion AI competitor called Loop. Here's how you can access it
description: Loop enables you to collaboratively create documents using any Microsoft Office application, like Outlook, Teams, or Word.

title: Looking for a less toxic TikTok alternative? This could be it
description: Zigazoo is aiming to be the next TikTok, except more positive and safer for kids. Would you try it?

description: The Hatch Restore 2 builds on the successes of the original sunrise alarm clock with improved speakers, audio tracks, and "Morning Moments."

title: The best Apple Watch Ultra strap of 2023
description: The top bands for the Apple Watch Ultra include the best straps for running and swimming, as well as the best luxury band for a night out.

title: Why every 3D printing enthusiast needs this $20 vacuum sealer (and how to use it)

title: Microsoft knocks $250 off Surface 9, offers Xbox Series S for all-time low

title: Crystal UHD vs QLED: Which Samsung TV should you buy?
description: Shopping for a Samsung TV but can't decide between Crystal UHD and QLED? We break down the key reasons to buy one display technology over the other in this comparison.
